questions.quote: Well, we... "bore false witness"... See I could be a reverend.
Chandler, can I just say something? I-I know you're still mad at me, I just wanna say that there were two people there that night. Okay? Two sets of lips.
Yeah, Rachel. And this is Ross' sister, Monica. We met at Thanksgiving. .
Okay, so that's another five hundred. Five hundred and five hundred, that's...
Oh, man. Oh, remember when I stuck that broom in your bike spokes, and you flipped over and hit your head on the curb?
Uh, hey, Rach let me ask you something. Uh, I was just over there talking to Monica and Chandler, boy they are really tight.
Please, I almost fell for that with, uh, Pride of the Yankees, I thought I was gonna see a film about Yankee pride and then, boom, the guy gets Lou Gehrig's disease.
Oh my God....What's he gonna do now? I can't watch! Oh. Seriously, how can you watch this? Aren't you scared?
Wow, Monica, you look just like your grandmother. How old was she there?
Okay... Hey listen, just before you go I-I again, I just wanna say "thank you" for coming with me.
